message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it, and I'm confident you'll be happy to pay a fair price for it. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my target price.  I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. What do you think?
Bob, I understand you're looking to get closer to your target price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering $1075000. What do you think?
